scripts.test: docker exec -it api-main sh -c "cd /tmp/api-main && ls && jest --watchAll --coverage=true --detectOpenHandles"
scripts.docker-start-container: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml start && docker logs api-main --follow --tail 100
scripts.docker-restart-container: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml restart && docker logs api-main --follow --tail 100
